data: undefined (A documentary that analyzes the glorious Italian horror movies from the sixties to the nineties, featuring never-before-seen interviews with all the main auteurs, screenwriters, set designers and musicians of the time, such as Dario Argento, Cristiana Astori, Pupi Avati or Lamberto Bava.)

A documentary that analyzes the glorious Italian horror movies from the sixties to the nineties, featuring never-before-seen interviews with all the main auteurs, screenwriters, set designers and musicians of the time, such as Dario Argento, Cristiana Astori, Pupi Avati or Lamberto Bava.
